mapper.select:
select contract_id as "contractId",contract_budget_price as "contractBudgetPrice",contract_budget_price_user as "contractBudgetPriceUser", contract_bidding_time as "contractBiddingTime",contract_type as "contractType",contract_number as "contractNumber", contract_alone as "contractAlone",contract_pro_number as "contractProNumber",contract_arch_time as "contractArchTime", contract_remark as "contractRemark",contract_natrue as "contractNatrue",(select dictdata_name from dictionarydata where id=contract_natrue) as "contractNatrueName",contract_money as "contractMoney",contract_bidding_type as "contractBiddingType", contract_advice as "contractAdvice",contract_check_user as "contractCheckUser",contract_check_time as "contract_check_time", contract_sign_time as "contractSignTime",contract_stamp_time as "contractStampTime",contract_back_time as "contractBackTime",contract_back_user as "contractBackUser", contract_sign_user as "contractSignUser",contract_dur as "contractDur",contract_duty as "contractDuty",contract_duty_time as "contractDutyTime", contract_create_user as "contractCreateUser",contract_create_time as "contractCreateTime" from project_contract where 1=1
and contract_number like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{contractNumber}), '%')
